Here are all my scripts, tried to start serves with task scheduler but no go, what is wrong?

A while back I ran some OpenRA servers on a Windows server, the OpenRa instances were configured as windows services. So I could log off the Windows users and the servers would just continue. 

The actual command line command was:
`Game.Mod=ra Server.Dedicated=true Server.DedicatedLoop=true Server.Name="OpenRA Dedicated 1" Server.ListenPort=1235 Server.ExternalPort=1235 Server.AdvertiseOnline=true Server.Map=ba403f6bcb4cae934335b78be42f714992b3a71a`

Using the NSSM - the Non-Sucking Service Manager (https://nssm.cc/) I created the windows services which ran the OpenRA server thingy. If for some reason the service stopped, it was automatically restarted. The setup worked quite good actually.

Here a screenshot about how the configuration roughly was. I hope this is usefull for your issue.
![openra_as_win_service](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5729926/6905261/228cee46-d727-11e4-97f2-4f4da771d24d.png)
